content: > this afghan is made starting at one > corner and working outward to the > desired width then to make it longer > i added more row to just one side of > the afghan at first it ends up as a > large square and lends itself well for > making a great afghan for any charity > where you make afghans for whether it > be a small afghan for a preemie using > baby yarn or a large afghan for a full > size adult i designed this afghan for > project linus
